LanguageData.SetUpCampDesc: Set up a camp, enabling you to forage, mine and hunt as well as reorganize your caravan.
LanguageData.SetUpCampFormedCamp: The caravan successfully set up a camp.
LanguageData.SetUpCampSettingsPermanentCamps: Enable permanent camps (disabling this will permanently delete all empty camps currently on the map)
LanguageData.SetUpCampAbandonDialogue: Are you sure you wish to permanently and irreversibly destroy this camp?
LanguageData.SetUpCampStillInUse: There are still colonists in the camp. You must form a caravan before abandoning the camp.
